ai-sn49:1-12.1.2_0: There the Buddha said to him:
ai-sn49:1-12.1.3_0: “Mendicants, there are these four right efforts.
ai-sn49:1-12.1.4_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn49:1-12.1.5_0: A mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:1-12.1.6_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that bad, unskillful qualities that have arisen are given up, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:1-12.1.7_0: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities arise.
ai-sn49:1-12.1.8_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are fulfilled by development, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:1-12.1.9_0: These are the four right efforts.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the four right efforts slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.3_0: And how does a mendicant who develops and cultivates the four right efforts slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
ai-sn49:1-12.2.4_0: A mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:1-12.2.5_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that bad, unskillful qualities that have arisen are given up, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:1-12.2.6_0: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities arise.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.7_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are fulfilled by development, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:1-12.2.8_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the four right efforts slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
ai-sn49:1-12.2.10_0: The first sub-chapter on succession is finished.
ai-sn49:1-12.3.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn49:13-22.1.1_0: (The text should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
ai-sn49:13-22.2.1_0: appears to me on the path,
ai-sn49:13-22.2.2_0: if he is on the root of the tree;
ai-sn49:23-34.1.1_0: “Mendicants, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-sn49:23-34.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the four right efforts depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-sn49:23-34.1.3_0: And how does a mendicant develop the four right efforts depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-sn49:23-34.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:23-34.1.5_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are fulfilled by development, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:23-34.1.6_0: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the four right efforts depending on and grounded on ethics.”
ai-sn49:23-34.1.7_0: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
ai-sn49:23-34.1.9_0: The third sub-chapter on strength is finished.
ai-sn49:23-34.2.2_0: cooking the tree by a curries,
ai-sn49:35-44.1.3_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-sn49:35-44.1.5_0: The four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three searches.
ai-sn49:35-44.1.6_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn49:35-44.1.7_0: It’s when a mendicant doesn’t arise ...
ai-sn49:35-44.1.8_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are fulfilled by development, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:35-44.1.9_0: These four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three searches.”
ai-sn49:35-44.1.10_0: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
ai-sn49:35-44.1.12_0: The fourth sub-chapter on searches is finished.
ai-sn49:35-44.2.3_0: dig up the stain and cutting,
ai-sn49:45-54.1.3_0: Desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous form, desire for rebirth in the formless realm, conceit, restlessness, and ignorance.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.4_0: These are the five higher fetters.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.5_0: The four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five higher fetters.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.6_0: What four? A person may have:
ai-sn49:45-54.1.7_0: It’s when a mendicant doesn’t arise ...
ai-sn49:45-54.1.8_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are fulfilled by development, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-sn49:45-54.1.9_0: These four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five higher fetters.”
ai-sn49:45-54.1.10_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-sn49:45-54.1.12_0: The fifth sub-chapter on floods is finished.
ai-sn49:45-54.2.3_0: The hindrances of the sensual stimulations,
ai-sn49:45-54.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on the Right Efforts is the fifth section.
